location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区知春路14号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院负责疾病预防、疫情防控、公共卫生应急事务的国务院部委管理的国家局，行政级别为副部级，由国家卫生健康委员会管理。
description.en: The National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention is a national bureau managed by ministries and commissions of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. It is responsible for disease prevention, epidemic control, and public health emergency affairs. It holds a vice-ministerial administrative rank and is managed by the National Health Commission.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管卫生健康事业的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national health and wellness.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、流行病学专家，中国工程院院士。现任国家疾病预防控制局局长、国家卫生健康委员会副主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, epidemiologist, and academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering. He is the current Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention and Deputy Director of the National Health Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，国家疾病预防控制局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，国家疾病预防控制局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，国家疾病预防控制局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，国家疾病预防控制局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家疾病预防控制局首任局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the first Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国家疾病预防控制局副局长、国家卫生健康委员会疾病预防控制局局长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention and Director of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国江苏省南京市的一所医科大学。
description.en: A medical university located in Nanjing, Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 1949年在中国察哈尔省北部发生的鼠疫疫情，促使中央防疫委员会成立。
description.en: A plague outbreak in the northern Chahar Province of China in 1949, which prompted the establishment of the Central Epidemic Prevention Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的国家政务最高管理机关，是中华人民共和国国务院的前身。
description.en: The highest state administrative body in the early days of the People's Republic of China, and the predecessor of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 为扑灭察北鼠疫而成立的临时机构，统一领导防疫工作。
description.en: A temporary body established to combat the Chabei plague, responsible for unified leadership of epidemic prevention efforts.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中央防疫委员会主任委员。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who once served as a chairman of the Central Epidemic Prevention Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任卫生部部长、中央防疫委员会主任委员。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Health and a chairman of the Central Epidemic Prevention Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任卫生部副部长、中央防疫委员会主任委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Vice Minister of Health and a chairman of the Central Epidemic Prevention Committee.

nodes.id: 中国疾病预防控制中心

zh-cn: 中国疾病预防控制中心
中国疾病预防控制中心（中国预防医学科学院）

description.zh-cn: 国家疾病预防控制局直属事业单位，实施国家级疾病预防控制与公共卫生技术管理和服务。
description.en: An institution directly under the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention, responsible for implementing national-level disease prevention and control and public health technical management and services.

description.zh-cn: 由国家疾病预防控制局主管的全国性、学术性、非营利性社会团体。
description.en: A national, academic, non-profit social organization supervised by the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

nodes.id: 国家卫生健康委员会疾病预防控制局

zh-cn: 国家卫生健康委员会疾病预防控制局
国务院防治艾滋病工作委员会#办事机构

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会的内设机构，是国家疾病预防控制局的直接前身。
description.en: The former internal department of the National Health Commission of the People's Republic of China, and the direct predecessor of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家疾病预防控制局由国家卫生健康委员会管理。
description.en: The National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention is managed by the National Health Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国家疾病预防控制局是中华人民共和国国务院下属的副部级国家局。
description.en: The National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention is a vice-ministerial-level national bureau under the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 2021年4月28日，国务院任命国家疾病预防控制局领导人员；同年5月13日，国家疾病预防控制局正式挂牌成立。
description.en: On April 28, 2021, the State Council appointed the leadership of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention; on May 13 of the same year, the Administration was officially inaugurated.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家卫生健康委员会

description.zh-cn: 沈洪兵兼任国家卫健委副主任。
description.en: Shen Hongbing concurrently serves as the Deputy Director of the National Health Commission.

description.zh-cn: 在2021年4月被任命为国家疾病预防控制局副局长前，担任南京医科大学校长。
description.en: Before being appointed as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention in April 2021, he served as the President of Nanjing Medical University.

relationships.target: 国家卫生健康委员会疾病预防控制局

description.zh-cn: 在被任命为国家疾病预防控制局副局长前，担任国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局局长。
description.en: Before being appointed as the Deputy Director of the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention, he served as the Director of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission.

description.zh-cn: 为扑灭察北鼠疫，中央人民政府政务院决议成立中央防疫委员会。
description.en: To combat the Chabei plague, the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government resolved to establish the Central Epidemic Prevention Committee.

relationships.source: 中国疾病预防控制中心

description.zh-cn: 中国疾病预防控制中心是国家疾病预防控制局的直属事业单位。
description.en: The Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention is a public institution directly under the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.

description.zh-cn: 中华预防医学会是国家疾病预防控制局主管的社会团体。
description.en: The Chinese Preventive Medicine Association is a social organization supervised by the National Administration of Disease Control and Prevention.
